attributes.action: spend his remaining time in power creating a uk totalitarian utopia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Democracy is a good way of getting things done very slowly. All political parties should be abolished and we should live under Tony Blair as leader. 

We can then implement a far more authoritarian police force and create a secret police to stop anti social behaviour.

All the totalitarian states of the 20th  century ultimately failed but thats because they were run by military despots. Lets change the stigma of totalitarianism by making Blair, Emperor Blair.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
